name: I'm Still Here (BXXD)
description:
"Memories fade alongside the passing of time; people move on. But I'm still here..."

A project for our Work Immersion class.

Play as a wandering spirit and reminisce by interacting with various objects throughout the game (notice the red items).

🎮Developed by: Nathan Red Bravante

My previous account: BAXXD 📼

🎶Music by: Ren Hur De Ocampo
